Title: Reunion
Plot: Liz is opposed to going to her high school reunion, but Jack manages to convince her otherwise. Meanwhile, Don Geiss (Rip Torn) wake up from his coma only to shock Jack with his declaration of who will be GE's CEO.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,sexual references and offensive language
GuestStars: Marion McCorry, Gerrianne Raphael, Jason Kravits, Robyn Lively
